title.native: グリザイア：ファントムトリガー

description:
Several years after The Fruit of Grisaia...

What was once "Mihama Academy," a sanctuary for young girls, has now been transformed into a SORD (Special Organization for Research & Development) training school dedicated to fostering talent for national defense. Rena and Maki specialize in firearms, Tohka and Gumi excel at sniping, Chris handles explosives and data processing, and Murasaki is a skilled ninja for intelligence operations. Together, they take on cases too complex for the police or Self-Defense Forces, repeatedly facing dangerous missions. This is the story of these young girls, painted in blood and gunpowder.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.native: グリザイア：ファントムトリガー THE ANIMATION スターゲイザー

name.native: 鯨瀬・クリスチィナ・桜子

node.description: Front Wing is a Japanese visual novel studio that products that specializes in the production of adult visual novels. To date, the company has released 22 different games, came with three popular well-English released games/anime of Makai Tenshi Jibril, Majo no Ochakai and Canary.
Freelancer formerly from [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/).

Matsumoto Fuminori, also known as Szak, is the representative of Metrowing which mainly produces musical composition. He produces several soundtracks for Visual Novel, his best known works are the songs of Grisaia no Rakuen, Subarashiki Hibi, ATRI -My Dear Moments-, Sakura no Uta and Sakura no Toki.

__Associated Names:__ Poyoyon Rock (ぽよよんろっく), Poyoyon♥Rock (ぽよよん♥ろっく), Pucchin Purin

[Twitter (NSFW)](https://twitter.com/punipoyo)

A Japanese animator, character designer, and animation director currently living in Tokyo, Japan. He often goes by the pseudonym Poyoyon Rock.  He is also a member of the doujinshi circle Pokopii.  

(Source: Wikipedia)

__Associated Names:__ Poyoyon Rock (ぽよよんろっく), Poyoyon♥Rock (ぽよよん♥ろっく), Pucchin Purin

President of Crunchyroll.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ohanakoyu)

Operations Officer at Bushiroad.
Formerly affiliated with [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/AIC), currently working at [Senju Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/7581/Senju-Kobo).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/108529192) | [Website](https://www.art-setting.com/) | [Nico Nico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/662388)

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

Affiliated with [Senju Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/7581/Senju-Kobo).
Affiliated with [Bibury Animation Studios](https://anilist.co/studio/6180/Bibury-Animation-Studios).

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
Affiliated with [Bibury Animation CG](https://anilist.co/studio/7006).
